page.title: 18HERMITAGE TRAFFIC SURVEY 2
page.content:
Results of a continuous traffic survey conducted outside Hermitage Primary School on Friday, 5th July, 1985, from 0800 to 1830
0800-0830 51 1300-1330 103 0830-0900 153 1330-1400 84 0900-0930 109 1400-1430 97 0930-1000 70 1430-1500 90 1000-1030 103 1500-1530 131 1030-1100 79 1530-1600 143 1100-1130 52 1600-1630 157 1130-1200 83 1630-1700 177 1200-1230 106 1700-1730 182 1230-1300 83 1730-1800 212 1800-1830 129
108 heavy vehicles passed before 1300, 76 passed between 1300 and 1800, so although in general there was more traffic in the afternoon, there was more heavy traffic in the morning.
